text: 5|82|Tumi arasye muminasakalara babe manuhara majata satrautata adhika kathora paba iyahudisakalaka arau yisakale sbirka karaiche sihamtaka. Arau muminasakalara babe bandhutbara disata ata'itakai ocarata paba se'isakala lokaka yisakale kaya, â€˜ami nacharaaâ€™, eya e'i karane ye, sihamtara majata bahuto pandita arau sansarabiraagi ache arau sihamte niscaya ahankara nakarae.
